argument.name: Fontname
argument.description: Character. The name of an installed font.

argument.name: Pointsize
argument.description: Numeric. An integer representing the point size.

argument.name: Style
argument.description: Character. Optional. The style representation. Default = "" (normal). The attributes may be combined, as in "BI" = bold italic

page.description: The {F} operator is used in the static text owner draw string to specify font, point size, and style.
